product_name: Black Diamond Positron Straight Gate Carabiner - Blemished
long_description: The Black Diamond Positron Straight Gate Carabiner delivers the anti-snag benefits of a keylock nose at a great price. It's ideal for racking and placing stoppers, or clipping and cleaning bolts. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. The 'biner measures slightly smaller than the Black Diamond Dynotron Carabiner, yet is still easy to hold. The Black Diamond Positron Straight Gate Carabiner works well on a quickdraw. Blemished; item has minor cosmetic blemishes that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The Black Diamond Positron Straight Gate Carabiner delivers the anti-snag benefits of a keylock nose at a great price. It's ideal for racking and placing stoppers, or clipping and cleaning bolts.
